title: Fail to calculate license consumption for Oracle DB
content:
Attempts to calculate license consumption for Oracle DB fails.

Cause

SAM calculates Oracle DB license consumption according to the Oracle LMS document, which is Oracle-verified. A possible cause for the calculation failure is that information is missing from the Oracle LMS document.

Solution

To calculate license consumption for Oracle DB, use Universal Discovery jobs related to Oracle LMS, such as the Oracle Database Connection by SQL job and the Oracle LMS Data Collection by SQL job. For more information on how to collect Oracle LMS data, see Universal Discovery Content PackÂ documentation.
